display_name: Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale: I like to stop and think things over before I do them
description:
Item from the Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale [Cyders et al 2014 (PMID: 24636739)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055534/)

Question text: For each statement, please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement.
